title: Leshamge Church
about: Leshamge Church is located in Samegrelo, Tsalenjikha Municipality, in the village of Leshamge. It is a medieval hall-type building with a semicircular protruding apse in the east. Two windows are cut in the western, southern and northern walls of the temple, and three windows in the eastern apse. There are no decorative elements on the facades. The church has two entrances, from the west and north, both entrances are architrave. Previously, the temple also had a third entrance - from the north, which is now bricked up. The structure stands on a single-stage base and is made of semi-finished stone.
